org.kepler.workflowrunmanager.gui

Class ColumnGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.TableColumn
      • org.kepler.workflowrunmanager.gui.ColumnGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ColumnGroup
extends javax.swing.table.TableColumn
    ColumnGroup, GroupableTableColumnModel, GroupableTableHeader, GroupableTableHeaderUI and GroupableTableCellRenderer taken from a post by Steve Webb (16/09/04). He extended code originally posted by Nobuo Tamemasa. Many thanks to both authors. I've made some changes, including making the headers editable.
    See Also:
